Special Offers

It is a country where the natural elements dance between the poles of fire and frost during winters with endless nights and summers where the sun never sets.

1 Week Summer Self Drive Tour of the Ring Road of Iceland & Golden Circle

Explore the stunning attractions of Iceland’s South Coast, Eastfjords, North and West as you travel the full Ring Road. This road trip is for anyone who likes to discover new places at their own pace, rather than having tour guides in control.

$90 $120.00
Book now

Guide to Iceland offers the most competitive prices in the B2B and B2C markets.

Self Drive Tours

Offer your customers a trip with flexibility and freedom. We take care of car rental, accommodation, activities and itineraries, all in white label.

Guided Tours

Accompanied by professional guides, we offer complete tours and accommodation with itineraries adapted to your requests

Tailor Made

Receive a personalised quote in 24 hours for all your special requests: excursions, hotels and whole stays. Our team of local specialists is at your disposal.
